mapper.select: SELECT EMP.EMP_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME, EMP.EMP_GENDER, EMP.EMP_BIRTH, EMP.EMP_PHONE, EMP.EMP_EMAIL, EMP.EMP_ADDRESS, EMP.EMP_EMPLOYMENT, EMP.EMP_DETAILADDRESS, EMP.EMP_POSTCODE, EMP.EMP_PASSWORD, EMP.EMP_AUTH, EMP_PROFILE, POS.NM AS EMP_RANK, -- 직급명 가져오기 DC.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE, -- 부서명 EMP.CREATE_DATE, EMP.MODIFY_DATE, EMP.CREATER, EMP.MODIFIER, EMP.USE_YN, EMP.AC_NO, EMP.AC_BANK, w.work_day AS WORK_DAY, w.work_start_time as WORK_START_TIME, w.work_end_time as WORK_END_TIME FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE EMP LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMON_CODE POS ON EMP.EMP_AUTH = POS.CD LEFT JOIN tbl_department DC ON EMP.DEPT_CODE = DC.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN tbl_work w on emp.emp_no =w.emp_no WHERE EMP.EMP_EMPLOYMENT = 'Y' AND EMP.EMP_EMPLOYMENT = 'Y' AND EMP.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_DATE(W.WORK_DAY, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD')
